Text: Why .wav files?????? These files are too big!!!
Finally someone who posts .wav files!  When will people learn that mp3's suck?  More quality, it's not like we don't have the bandwidth nowadays.
Yes it is. It'll take me at least a week to get these, even then it would be a hell of a time seeding them.
are you stupid? mp3's are better quality. you are surely a dumbass.
actually mp3s are NOT better quality than wav files, however mp3s are significantly smaller files sizes
Any chance on Seeding this one again?

WAV files waste space, processing, and bus bandwidth, not to mention internet bandwidth!  MP3 does lose a little quality so it's not ideal for archiving.

The answer?  FLAC!  Free Lossless Audio Codec.  Smaller space but with ZERO loss.

Anyway, thanks for the tunes!
guys. use common sense and just get a .wav to mp3 converter..
